content.json: #### Detection counts for Attachment Protect, URL Protect and Impersonation Protect

content.query:
union MimecastTTPUrl_CL, MimecastTTPAttachment_CL, MimecastTTPImpersonation_CL
| summarize Count=count() by Type, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)

MimecastTTPUrl_CL
| where scanResult_s == "malicious"
| summarize count() by Type, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)

MimecastTTPUrl_CL
| where scanResult_s == "malicious"
| summarize count() by userEmailAddress_s

MimecastTTPUrl_CL
| where TimeGenerated > ago(100d) and scanResult_s == "malicious" and action_s != "allow"
| summarize count() by fromUserEmailAddress_s

MimecastTTPUrl_CL
| where scanResult_s == "malicious"
| summarize count() by url_s

content.json: #### Top 10 Advanced  Phishing Results - Credential Theft Brands

content.query:
MimecastTTPUrl_CL
| extend advancedPhishingResult_CredentialTheftBrands = column_ifexists("advancedPhishingResult_CredentialTheftBrands_s","")
| where scanResult_s == "malicious" and advancedPhishingResult_CredentialTheftBrands != ""
| summarize count() by advancedPhishingResult_CredentialTheftBrands

content.json: #### Top 10 Advanced Phishing Results - Credential Theft Evidence

content.query:
MimecastTTPUrl_CL
| where scanResult_s == "malicious" and advancedPhishingResult_CredentialTheftEvidence_s !=""
| summarize count() by advancedPhishingResult_CredentialTheftEvidence_s

content.json: #### Advanced Phishing Result - Credential Theft Tags

content.query:
MimecastTTPUrl_CL
| where scanResult_s == "malicious" and advancedPhishingResult_CredentialTheftTags_s !=""
| summarize count() by advancedPhishingResult_CredentialTheftTags_s

MimecastTTPUrl_CL
| where scanResult_s == "malicious" and ttpDefinition_s !=""
| summarize count() by ttpDefinition_s

MimecastTTPUrl_CL
| where scanResult_s == "malicious" and action_s !=""
| summarize count() by action_s

MimecastTTPUrl_CL
| where scanResult_s == "malicious" and adminOverride_s !="N/A"
| summarize count() by adminOverride_s

MimecastTTPUrl_CL
| where scanResult_s == "malicious" and userOverride_s !="None"
| summarize count() by userOverride_s

MimecastTTPUrl_CL
| where scanResult_s == "malicious"
| summarize count() by Category

MimecastTTPUrl_CL
| where scanResult_s == "malicious"
| summarize count() by sendingIp_s

MimecastTTPUrl_CL
| where scanResult_s == "malicious"
| summarize count() by userAwarenessAction_s

content.json: #### Top 10 Internal Email Protect Mitigations by Actions

content.query:
MimecastTTPUrl_CL
| where scanResult_s == "malicious"
| summarize count() by actions_s

content.json: #### Top 10 Email Subjects Containing Malicious URLs

content.query:
MimecastTTPUrl_CL
| where scanResult_s == "malicious"
| summarize count() by subject_s

MimecastTTPAttachment_CL 
| where result_s != "safe"
| summarize count() by Type, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)

MimecastTTPAttachment_CL
| where result_s != "safe"
| summarize count() by recipientAddress_s

MimecastTTPAttachment_CL
| where result_s <> "safe"
| summarize count() by senderAddress_s

MimecastTTPAttachment_CL
| where result_s != "safe"
| summarize count() by actionTriggered_s

content.json: #### Top 10 Malicious Attachment File Mime Types

content.query:
MimecastTTPAttachment_CL
| where result_s != "safe"
| summarize count() by fileType_s

MimecastTTPAttachment_CL
| where result_s != "safe"
| summarize count() by result_s

MimecastTTPAttachment_CL
| where result_s != "safe"
| summarize count() by details_s

content.json: #### Top 10 Subjects for Emails Containing Malicious Attachments

content.query:
MimecastTTPAttachment_CL
| where result_s != "safe"
| summarize count() by subject_s

MimecastTTPAttachment_CL
| where result_s != "safe"
| summarize count() by fileHash_s

MimecastTTPImpersonation_CL
| where  taggedMalicious_b == true
| summarize count() by Type, bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)

MimecastTTPImpersonation_CL
| where  taggedMalicious_b == true
| summarize count() by recipientAddress_s

content.json: #### Senders that trigged Impersonation Protect events

content.query:
MimecastTTPImpersonation_CL
| where  taggedMalicious_b == true and TimeGenerated > ago(100d)
| summarize count() by senderAddress_s

MimecastTTPImpersonation_CL
| where  taggedMalicious_b == true
| summarize count() by impersonationResults_s

MimecastTTPImpersonation_CL
| where  taggedMalicious_b == true
| summarize count() by identifiers_s
